description.en:
NEEVA IS A TOKEN FROM THE ETHEREUM NETWORK THAT EMERGES WITH THE PROMISING NEWS OF BEING DEFI!

DeFi means "Decentralized Finances” and it is about the use of technologies such as blockchain, stablecoins, and smart contracts, for example, to decentralize products and financial solutions. Tokens are the perfect opportunity for a person to use financial tools that used to be limited and are now 100% decentralized for their negotiations!
